Detailed Description

CGridColumnTraitDateTime implements a CDateTimeCtrl as cell-editor.

int CGridColumnTraitDateTime::CompareCellValues ( LPCTSTR  pszLeftValue,
LPCTSTR  pszRightValue,
bool  bAscending 
) [virtual]

Compares two cell values according to specified sort order.

Parameters:
pszLeftValue Left cell value
pszRightValue Right cell value
bAscending Perform sorting in ascending or descending order
Returns:
Is left value less than right value (-1) or equal (0) or larger (1)

int  nRow,
int  nCol,
const CRect &  rect 
) [protected, virtual]

Create a CDateTimeCtrl as cell value editor.

Parameters:
owner The list control starting a cell edit
nRow The index of the row
nCol The index of the column
rect The rectangle where the inplace cell value editor should be placed
Returns:
Pointer to the cell editor to use

int  nRow,
int  nCol 
) [virtual]

Overrides OnEditBegin() to provide a CDateTimeCtrl cell value editor.

Parameters:
owner The list control starting edit
nRow The index of the row for the cell to edit
nCol The index of the column for the cell to edit
Returns:
Pointer to the cell editor to use (NULL if cell edit is not possible)
